name: Alien Clicker (Abaz Games)
description:
"Alien Clicker" - is a simple clicker. You flew across the vastness of the universe, but suddenly your ship breaks down, you have to save money to fly away from the planet Earth, unfamiliar to you.  Be careful, because people and people from your planet will not be happy about you.

"Alien Clicker" - is the first project of "Abaz Games" studio. Take part in the beta test and help us make quality games!
